    • Method Detail

      • build

        public MobileSuite build()
        Build MobileSuite singleton instance. Make sure to call it once only as the second call will throw RuntimeException
        Returns:
        the mobile suite

      • withActivationCode

        public MobileSuite.Builder withActivationCode(@NonNull
                                              java.lang.String activationCode)
        Build MobileSuite with activation code.
        Parameters:
        activationCode - The activation code. This value is use to unlock Secure Messenger, VIC Token or Secure PinPad feature. This value could be retrieved from Gemalto representative. The value is in Hex string format.
        Returns:
        the builder.

      • withDeviceBinding

        public MobileSuite.Builder withDeviceBinding(boolean deviceBinding)
        Build MobileSuite with device binding. If this value is set, the token will tied with the device where the application installed.
        Parameters:
        deviceBinding - Set activation code. Default policy is DefaultSettings.DEVICE_BINDING.
        Returns:
        the builder.

      • withPassword

        public MobileSuite.Builder withPassword(@NonNull
                                        java.lang.String password)
        Build MobileSuite with password.
        Parameters:
        password - A custom password to set. This password is used to protect Mobile Protector, Secure Messenger or Secure Storage data.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • withMspObfuscationKeys

        public MobileSuite.Builder withMspObfuscationKeys(java.util.List<byte[]> mspObfuscationKeys)
        Build MobileSuite with msp obfuscation keys.
        Parameters:
        mspObfuscationKeys - the msp obfuscation keys
        Returns:
        the builder

      • withMspVerificationKeys

        public MobileSuite.Builder withMspVerificationKeys(java.util.List<TransactionSignatureKey> mspSignatureKeys)
        Build MobileSuite with msp verification keys.
        Parameters:
        mspSignatureKeys - the msp signature keys
        Returns:
        the builder
